reference.title: cxxEnumerationDefinition
reference.shortdesc: Container for child elements describing the visiblilty and location of a C++ enum..

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxEnumerationDefinition> element is defined within <cxxEnumerationDetail>. The child element <cxxEnumerationAPIItemLocation> is mandatory.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxEnumerationDefinition> <cxxEnumerationAccessSpecifier value="public"/> <cxxEnumerationAPIItemLocation> <cxxEnumerationDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="C:/src/include/e32base.h"/> <cxxEnumerationDeclarationFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="2784"/> <cxxEnumerationDeclarationFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="2854"/> </cxxEnumerationAPIItemLocation> </cxxEnumerationDefinition>
